Package com.advertisementproject.userservice.db.entity

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.userservice.db.entity.User
@Entity
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
User entity with core account information about a user. Raw password is transient and ignored for JSON which means that it can be validated along with the rest of the fields but won't show up as JSON or be saved in the database.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private @NotNull @Size(min=2,max=20,message="Address must be 2-20 characters long") java.lang.String address
    Street address for the user.
    private @NotNull @Size(min=2,max=20,message="City must be 2-20 characters long") java.lang.String city
    City for the user address.
    private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+$",message="Must enter an valid email") java.lang.String email
    Email address for the user which must be unique.
    private boolean enabled
    Whether the user account is enabled.
    private @NotNull @Size(min=60,max=60) java.lang.String hashedPassword
    Hashed password from the raw password the user submitted upon registration.
    private java.util.UUID id
    Primary id for User entity.
    private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{10}$",message="PhoneNumber must be exactly 10 digits") java.lang.String phoneNumber
    Phone number for the user.
    private @Pattern(regexp="^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[!@#&()\u00e2\u20ac\u201c[{}]:;\',?/*~$^+=<>]).{8,20}$",message="Password must contain at least one digit [0-9], at least one lowercase Latin character [a-z], at least one uppercase Latin character [A-Z], at least one special character like ! @ # & ( ) and have a length of at least 8 characters and a maximum of 20 characters") java.lang.String rawPassword
    Raw password for the user account which is not saved in the database and not exposed as JSON.
    private Role role
    The role of the user, which determines access rights within the system, as defined by Zuul Gateway application.
    private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{5}$",message="Zip code must be 5 digits long") java.lang.String zipCode
    Zip code or postal code for the user address.

  • Field Details

    • id

      private java.util.UUID id
      Primary id for User entity.

    • email

      @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+$", message="Must enter an valid email") private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[A-Za-z0-9+_.-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+$",message="Must enter an valid email") java.lang.String email
      Email address for the user which must be unique. Used as a username when logging in through the Zuul Gateway application.

    • rawPassword

      @Pattern(regexp="^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[!@#&()\u00e2\u20ac\u201c[{}]:;\',?/*~$^+=<>]).{8,20}$", message="Password must contain at least one digit [0-9], at least one lowercase Latin character [a-z], at least one uppercase Latin character [A-Z], at least one special character like ! @ # & ( ) and have a length of at least 8 characters and a maximum of 20 characters") private @Pattern(regexp="^(?=.*[0-9])(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[!@#&()\u00e2\u20ac\u201c[{}]:;\',?/*~$^+=<>]).{8,20}$",message="Password must contain at least one digit [0-9], at least one lowercase Latin character [a-z], at least one uppercase Latin character [A-Z], at least one special character like ! @ # & ( ) and have a length of at least 8 characters and a maximum of 20 characters") java.lang.String rawPassword
      Raw password for the user account which is not saved in the database and not exposed as JSON. It only exists in the user class so it can easily be validated along with all the other fields.

    • hashedPassword

      @NotNull @Size(min=60, max=60) private @NotNull @Size(min=60,max=60) java.lang.String hashedPassword
      Hashed password from the raw password the user submitted upon registration.

    • phoneNumber

      @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{10}$", message="PhoneNumber must be exactly 10 digits") private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{10}$",message="PhoneNumber must be exactly 10 digits") java.lang.String phoneNumber
      Phone number for the user.

    • role

      private Role role
      The role of the user, which determines access rights within the system, as defined by Zuul Gateway application.

    • address

      @NotNull @Size(min=2, max=20, message="Address must be 2-20 characters long") private @NotNull @Size(min=2,max=20,message="Address must be 2-20 characters long") java.lang.String address
      Street address for the user.

    • city

      @NotNull @Size(min=2, max=20, message="City must be 2-20 characters long") private @NotNull @Size(min=2,max=20,message="City must be 2-20 characters long") java.lang.String city
      City for the user address.

    • zipCode

      @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{5}$", message="Zip code must be 5 digits long") private @NotNull @Pattern(regexp="^[0-9]{5}$",message="Zip code must be 5 digits long") java.lang.String zipCode
      Zip code or postal code for the user address.

    • enabled

      private boolean enabled
      Whether the user account is enabled. Set to true if the user's email has been enabled, otherwise false.
